scripts.prepare:typia-repo:init: git submodule init && git submodule update
scripts.prepare:all: npm run prepare:build-typescript-rtti && npm run prepare:npm-install && npm run prepare:typia-repo:init && npm run prepare:typia-repo:npm-install && npm run prepare:namespace_bug_workaround
scripts.clean: ttsc --build --clean && node applyNamespaceBugPatches.js --clean && rm -rf typia-repo/test/build/internal/*.js && rm -rf typia-repo/test/build/internal/*.map && rm -rf typia-repo/test/src/helpers/*.js && rm -rf typia-repo/test/src/helpers/*.map
